con:testCase.name: TC933_DeleteFailsWhenThereAreAssignmentsInvolved
con:testCase.con:description: T-933: "Deletes" fail when there are assignments involved

con:configuration.content: Cannot delete application ${#TestCase#applicationKey} because of the following assignments: tenant assignment count: 1 deployment assignment count: 1 route assignment count: 1
Cannot delete deployment ${#TestCase#deploymentKey} because of the following assignments: tenant assignment count: 1 route assignment count: 1
Cannot delete tenant ${#TestCase#tenantKey} because of the following assignments: application assignment count: 1 deployment assignment count: 1 route assignment count: 1
Cannot unassign application from tenant because there are 1 route(s) assigned to tenant ${#TestCase#tenantKey} and application ${#TestCase#applicationKey}
Cannot unassign deployment from tenant because there are 1 route(s) assigned to tenant ${#TestCase#tenantKey} and deployment ${#TestCase#deploymentKey}
Cannot delete application ${#TestCase#applicationKey} because of the following assignments: tenant assignment count: 1 deployment assignment count: 1
Cannot delete deployment ${#TestCase#deploymentKey} because of the following assignments: tenant assignment count: 1
Cannot delete tenant ${#TestCase#tenantKey} because of the following assignments: application assignment count: 1 deployment assignment count: 1
Cannot delete application ${#TestCase#applicationKey} because of the following assignments: deployment assignment count: 1
The key in response body is missing.
Cannot save route - Route must have a tenantKey that matches the tenantKey when when the route was originally added.
Cannot save route - Route must have an applicationKey that matches the applicationKey when the route was originally added.
Unable to add route because associated deploymentKey is not specified

con:config.script:
int currentPageNumber = Integer.parseInt(testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("currentPageNumber")) + 1
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("currentPageNumber", Integer.toString(currentPageNumber))
log.info " Current Page Number: " + currentPageNumber
